author: Drake Hardin
comment: I was pretty close to requesting a refund, but found that the phone app allowed the customization of the different superheroes. I was trying to do it solely from the watch on the Fossil Q Founder 2. Once I figured it out, I love it! Good purchase :)

author: Rhiannon Slack-Sanders
comment: I am giving this app one star, not because I hate it, because I only have access to the Batman face. There seems to be no way to change the superhero.  I have the Fossil Q Marshal.....help or suggestions would be appreciated.

reply.author: FabulousWatchFaces
reply.content: Watch Face settings are available on companion app for phone. So you should install it to be able to personalize watch face. This is the same app.

author: Alvin Andrean
comment: Haven't been able to use the other wallpapers other than batman for a long time now. Even across different watches (moto 360 2nd gen, Asus zenwatch 3, Fossil Q Explorist)

I have android wear app on iPhone and a Nixon Mission watch and all i get is the one watch face which is Batman. I mean this is a cool watch face but i want the other ones also and if i am paying $2.89 for it you would expect to be told if it does not work going through and apple device. Thanks

author: Rudraksh Pahade
comment: Why am I not able to change watch face on my Moto 360 Sports 2nd Gen. I tried to restart my watch, but got no luck. Am uninstalling this app.

author: phalaphoom thamniyom
comment: Please add battery indicator option. It will be perfect!!

author: Eric Pereira
comment: My first paid watch face and I really like it. Please update the heroes. I'd like to see Green Lantern, Wonder Woman, Wolverine and more. UPDATE: On my Moto 360, if Ambient mode is turned off, the Heroes watch face is replaced with the watch's default watch face.

author: Josef Ford
comment: I really wanted this to work but as soon as I purchased it. It didnt load the faces on my watch. And I mean any of them I tried different settings and different wallpapers but not one of them worked. Highly dissatisfied I was truly looking forward to this

reply.author: FabulousWatchFaces
reply.content: How long you installed watchface? Maybe it is still uploading to your watches. Can you send screenshot of your AndroidWear phone app with selected watchface and what watches do you use.

author: Daniel Williams
comment: Disappointed works for few seconds then all i get on my watch is "unfortunately heroes has stopped" rebooted 3 times and reinstalled twice

reply.author: FabulousWatchFaces
reply.content: You can send an error report to our email and describe the problem in detail. Thank you!

author: Joe Sanko
comment: Won't push the theme to the watch

reply.author: FabulousWatchFaces
reply.content: How long you installed watchface? Wait for a while watch face uploading to your watches. This is a little bit slow, because of many hd quality images. Also if connection was lost, uploading will resume later.

author: Nam Tran
comment: Wish it includes Ambient mode. You can use some super hero icons in ambient mode with digital clock.

reply.author: FabulousWatchFaces
reply.content: Thank you for review! New update will be available on next week.

title: Almost perfect
